lsh module¶

lsh.get_candidates(sig_mat: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, b, r)[source]¶

Performs Loaclity Sensitive Hashing on generated Signatures. Hashes columns based on bands

Parameters

  • sig_mat (str) – Signature matrix generated using the LSH family

  • b (int) – Number of bands

  • r (int) – Number of rows per band

Returns

The set of candidate pairs

Return type

set

Plagiarism Checker using LSH
